content.raw:
I think Guido's head would explode on some of those long lines, but I'm not a long-line zealot and was just about to click merge.

I think probably @PhyNerd could pull from mainline and dummy-merge its default branch into this branch (a merge discarding the changes in the default branch), and then manually make the change to this one. I think that would probably work!
content.html:
I think Guido's head would explode on some of those long lines, but I'm not a long-line zealot and was just about to click merge.

I think probably @PhyNerd could pull from mainline and dummy-merge its default branch into this branch (a merge discarding the changes in the default branch), and then manually make the change to this one. I think that would probably work!
